extraction_steps: Extracted image URL from markdown content
Analyzed image using Claude Vision API
Identified AWS service icons: ECS, ALB, RDS, VPC
Mapped icon positions to infer architecture topology
scraping_info.analysis_notes: Inferred ECS cluster from container icons. ALB placement determined from load balancer symbol. RDS identified from database cylinder icon.
scraping_info.limitations: Service configurations and IAM roles not visible in diagram
